history.narrative: Law 6-209, the “Tax Amnesty Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-398, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 25, 1986 and December 16, 1986 respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 8, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 6-269 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
